Frequently Asked Questions

How long does implementation take?

Most utilities see results in 4-6 weeks. We handle the technical integration while you focus on operations.

What if my team doesn't want to change their workflow?

Clarion works alongside existing systems. Your team keeps using their current tools exactly as before, but now with intelligent insights and automation.

How much does it cost?

Pricing is based on your specific needs. Most utilities see 3-5x ROI within the first year. Book a demo for a custom quote.

Can I integrate with my existing SCADA and AMI systems?

Yes! Clarion integrates with all major SCADA platforms (Wonderware, iFIX, ClearSCADA) and AMI systems (Sensus, Itron, Badger). We'll help you connect your existing infrastructure.

What about data security?

Clarion meets all utility industry security standards including NERC CIP, AWWA, and state-specific requirements. Your data stays secure and compliant.
